title: Australia's Japan Boom! Top Attractions Revealed
description: Discover the surge in Australian tourism to Japan!  In 2024, a remarkable 920,000 Australians explored the Land of the Rising Sun, a number projected to hit one million by the end of 2025.  May 2025 saw a particular influx of Aussie travelers.  While Tokyo, Osaka, and Kyoto remain popular,  Ishikawa, Gifu, and Wakayama prefectures are experiencing a significant rise in Australian visitors, showcasing the expanding appeal of Japanese travel beyond the major cities.  Explore the diverse experiences awaiting Australian tourists in Japan.  Learn more about this exciting travel trend and plan your own adventure!
